label: 徳政
本: Court and Bakufu in Japan:  Essays in Kamakura History . Stanford University Press . 1982
説明文: A general term meaning governmental policy or reform. Later, a Bakufu order limiting or nullifying commercial transactions involving lands that had been lost or sold by housemen. Later still, a general term for any decree, civil or military, that canceled a dept or sale.　[Cf. Mass, 1976.]
